content:
Laurent rides his bike while he delivers meals every day.

He recorded the total weight of the meals (grams) he delivered and how far (in kilometers) he rode his bike for five delivery trips.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Weight (g)** | $600$ | $450$ | $350$ | $500$ | $250$
**Distance (km)** | $9$ | $7$ | $5$ | $6$ | $4$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
